column2: out of all the Ramen places I have tried in Houston
column3: Jinya is the only one I have cravings for.  The key is the broth - they really mastered it.  My personal favorite is the Tonkutsu Black.  Just the perfect balance of umami
column5: and oiliness.  The egg and pork are perfectly cooked as well.  Even though the restaurant is always packed
